description: This file defines a React functional component 'BulkUploader' for uploading and validating bulk data files (CSV/XLSX) with client-side parsing, server submission, error handling, and user interface controls. It includes internal functions for managing local storage, query parameters, and accessibility features.

methods.name: acceptFor
methods.description: Generates appropriate accept attribute string for file inputs based on resource kind (CSV/XLSX).

methods.name: readFromLocalStorage
methods.description: Safely retrieves a value from localStorage by key, returning undefined if unavailable.

methods.name: saveToLocalStorage
methods.description: Saves a key-value pair to localStorage, removing the key if the value is empty.

methods.name: getFirstQueryParam
methods.description: Extracts the first non-empty value among provided URL query parameters.

methods.name: ErrorList
methods.description: React component that displays a list of row errors with accessibility features.
